definitions.definition: Of or connected with the apex .
Situated at the growing tip of the plant or its roots, in comparison with intercalary growth situated between zones of permanent tissue.
Produced with the tip of the tongue.

main_definition: Of or connected with the apex .
secondary_definitions: ( botany , of a meristem ) Situated at the growing tip of the plant or its roots, in comparison with intercalary growth situated between zones of permanent tissue.
( phonetics , phonology , of a sound ) Produced with the tip of the tongue.
